Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-------------------------------- Judgement Sword -------------------------------------
-- Has two abilities -- Call for Judgement -- -- Will of Judgement -- --
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid
-- Animations local raiseAnim local judgeAnim
local tempHumanoids = {} -- Humanoids to be affected
local restorePos
local co -- coroutine to restrict call of judgement to once per 12 seconds local co60 -- coroutine to restrict will of judgement to be once per 60 seconds local resetCo -- coroutine to reset the humanoid walkspeeds back to normal after 5 seconds
local camera
local chars = {} -- table to store the characters to be attacked
local cloneActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("CloneActive")
local pos = Tool:FindFirstChild("Pos") local resetValue = 0
local willOfFire = Instance.new("Part") willOfFire.Name = "JUDGEMENT" willOfFire.Shape = "Ball" willOfFire.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) willOfFire.FormFactor = 3 willOfFire.Transparency = 0.8 willOfFire.CanCollide = false
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0.75) fire.Parent = willOfFire fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 0, 0.75)
float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, willOfFire:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) float.Parent = willOfFire
movement = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") movement.P = 100000 movement.maxForce = Vector3.new(movement.P, movement.P, movement.P) movement.Name = "Velocity"
local willClone local sparkles local distance
local camera local cloneHackScript
local cloneActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("CloneActive")
function resetSpeed() for i =1, #tempHumanoids do tempHumanoids[i].WalkSpeed = 16 ratio = tempHumanoids[i].Health/tempHumanoids[i].MaxHealth tempHumanoids[i].Health = ratio * 100 tempHumanoids[i].MaxHealth = 100 end end
function wait15() wait(15) end
function wait60() wait(60) end
-- HotThoth's insane character maker code, modified to suit my needs -- function copyCharacter() end
function spawnChar() end
function judge(key) if key:lower() == "x" then if co == nil or coroutine.status(co) == 'dead' then co = coroutine.create(wait15) coroutine.resume(co) myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if raiseAnim then raiseAnim:Play() end wait(0.4) if myTorso then print("JUDGING") sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkles.Parent = Sword players = game.Players:GetChildren() vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if #players > 1 then for i = 1, #players do if players[i] ~= vPlayer then tempChar = players[i].Character tmpHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tempChar and tmpHumanoid then print("POPULATING THE HUMANOID TABLE") table.insert(tempHumanoids, tmpHumanoid) end end end if #tempHumanoids >= 1 then print("DIE LESSER MORTALS") for i = 1, #tempHumanoids do ratio = tempHumanoids[i].Health/tempHumanoids[i].MaxHealth tempHumanoids[i].Health = ratio * 75 tempHumanoids[i].MaxHealth = 75 tempHumanoids[i].WalkSpeed = tempHumanoids[i].WalkSpeed - (0.7 * (tempHumanoids[i].WalkSpeed *(1 - ratio))) end end end if sparkles then wait(0.4) sparkles:Remove() end end end elseif key:lower() == "z" then if co60 == nil or coroutine.status(co60) == 'dead' then resetValue = 1 cloneActive.Value = 1 print("Entering Judgement") co60 = coroutine.create(wait60) coroutine.resume(co60) -- Anchor the Torso and remove the player to farthest end of the world myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myTorso.Anchored = true spawnChar() if myTorso then restorePos = myTorso.Position chars = {} players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do -- Populate the character table char = players[i].Character torso = char:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then if players[i].Character ~= vCharacter and (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude < 125 then table.insert(chars, players[i].Character) end end end --myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 50000, 0)) -- TROLOLOL -- if #chars >= 1 then print(#chars) cloneHackScript = script.HackScript:Clone() cloneHackScript.Parent = Tool cloneHackScript.Disabled = false willClone = willOfFire:Clone() willClone.Position = myTorso.Position camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera camera.CameraType = "Attach" willClone.Parent = game.Workspace --local mv = movement:clone() for i =1, #chars do print("Found Char") willClone.Parent = game.Workspace camera.CameraSubject = willClone myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 50000, 0)) -- TROLOLOL -- --mv.Parent = willClone local tempTorso = chars[i]:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempTorso then distance = (tempTorso.Position - willClone.Position).magnitude local count = 0 while distance > 4.0 and count < 300 do count = count + 1 wait() distance = (tempTorso.Position - willClone.Position).magnitude pos.Value = (tempTorso.Position - willClone.Position).unit * 60.0 end myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(willClone.Position, tempTorso.Position) camera.CameraSubject = myTorso willClone.Parent = game.Lighting if judgeAnim then judgeAnim:Play() end humanoid = chars[i]:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(50) end --mv.Parent = vCharacter wait(0.25) print("Number of Characters judged: ", i) end end if mv then mv:Remove() end wait(2) myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(restorePos) if willClone then willClone:Remove() end myTorso.Anchored = false camera.CameraSubject = vCharacter camera.CameraType = "Custom" if cloneHackScript then cloneHackScript:Remove() end end end cloneActive.Value = 0 resetValue = 0 end end end
function onActivated() end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then judgeAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.JudgeAnim) raiseAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.RaiseAnim) end mouse.KeyDown:connect(judge) end
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if myTorso and restorePos and resetValue == 1 then myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(restorePos) myTorso.Anchored = false resetValue = 0 end
if willClone then willClone:Remove() end if camera then wait(0.2) camera.CameraSubject = vCharacter camera.CameraType = "Custom" end if sparkles then sparkles:Remove() end if judgeAnim then judgeAnim:Stop() end
if cloneActive then cloneActive.Value = 0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent
pos = Tool:FindFirstChild("Pos")
judgementBall = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("JUDGEMENT")
while judgementBall == nil do judgementBall = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("JUDGEMENT") wait(1.0) end
bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.Name = "Movement" bv.P = 100000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(100000, 100000, 100000) bv.Parent = judgementBall
function onChange() bv.velocity = pos.Value end
pos.Changed:connect(onChange)

-- SWORD OF JUDGEMENT -- -- HEAVY DAMAGE -- -- ACTIVE ABILITIES -- r = game:service("RunService") local sword = script.Parent.Handle local Tool = script.Parent
local damage = 16
local slash_damage = 24 local lunge_damage = 32
local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = sword SlashSound.Volume = .7
local LungeSound = Instance.new("Sound") LungeSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordlunge.wav" LungeSound.Parent = sword LungeSound.Volume = .6
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = sword UnsheathSound.Volume = 1
local cloneActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("CloneActive")
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function attack() damage = slash_damage SlashSound:play() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function lunge() damage = lunge_damage LungeSound:play()
local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Lunge" anim.Parent = Tool
force = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") force.velocity = Vector3.new(0,10,0) --Tool.Parent.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 80 force.Parent = Tool.Parent.Torso wait(.2) swordOut() wait(.2) force.Parent = nil wait(.4) swordUp() damage = slash_damage end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,-1, 0) end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) end
Tool.Enabled = true local last_attack = 0 function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
if cloneActive.Value == 1 then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
t = r.Stepped:wait()
if (t - last_attack < .2) then lunge() else attack() end
last_attack = t
--wait(0.5)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() UnsheathSound:play() end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
connection = sword.Touched:connect(blow)
